alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 2:20AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Alameda, east central San Mateo, eastern Contra Costa and northwestern Santa Clara Counties through 315 AM PST... At 220 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Collinsville to near Dublin to near Stanford. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Fremont, Hayward, Sunnyvale, Santa Clara, Antioch, Livermore, Mountain View, San Ramon, Pleasanton, Union City, Milpitas, Palo Alto, Pittsburg, Dublin, Newark, Danville, Oakley, Menlo Park and Los Altos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains
